website_summaries.verdict: Powerful grill that's made for a built-in cooking area on an outdoor patio.
pros: Delivers a large cooking area for a built-in grill
Has 66,000 BTU and five different gas burners
Stainless steel design looks great for a built-in grill area
Lighter works reliably over hundreds of uses
cons: Not made as a standalone grill
May be too big for some people

customer_reviews.title: Great Grill at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I've been using my Napoleon Prestige grill for several months and am very pleased with the quality and how it grills. The difference between this built in and others I looked at is that the part you don't see is an aluminum casting which undoubtedly made it less expensive to construct. But you don't need or really want Stainless steel in the areas where they don't use it. Everything I wanted and needed and at a great price. I
customer_reviews.author: Steven Stiles

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with grill.  Poor manual.
customer_reviews.text: Pro: So far I love the grill. We have not used the infrared feature yet and I am not sure exactly how to use it Con: the manual that came with the grill was very hard to follow and I could not figure out what went where using the manual. It was a trial and error basis. Also the start button on the left side doesn’t work at all. Will contact amazon regarding this. The grill did not fit the space with the included bolts so I had to go to hardware store and buy flatheaded ones but now it fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: R. E. Starritt

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my Napoleon Grill.
customer_reviews.text: Easy enough to assemble and install. Need two people to lift it in place. I haven't had it long but it seems to be of good quality and I don't see any weaknesses. Used the rotisserie and it does the job well. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: This grill has everything
customer_reviews.text: This grill is great and was easy to install. I’ve cooked on it dozens of times already and the grilling surface cooks pretty evenly. I used the rotisserie and made a delicious roast pork.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon ClA

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic grill.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve long been a fan of Napoleon grills and this one is no different. The infrared rear burner is a great addition for the rotisserie.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: The product is average. Sometimes does not light the first time. This is the first “Builtin grill” I have owned. I usually have the stand alone LP grills. This one cooks the same as the less expensive grills. Also, to reach their customer service people, be prepared to be on hold for 30 minutes. However, they a very nice once you get them in the phone
customer_reviews.author: Pat Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great grill!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this grill. The surface does not allow food to stick easily, it cooks evenly and the top warming shelf is an asset to have when cooking different meats or vegetables. My only complaint is that one of the grill lines was bent up when it was delivered. It is easy to install and the stainless steel looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Joy Baumgarten

customer_reviews.title: Second Time Was the Charm
customer_reviews.text: First one arrived severely damaged in route - the vendor made quick work of getting me the second one and I couldn't be happier - its a GREAT grill!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Good grill for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Rear Burner does not self-ignite, so you need to push the ignition switch to light it. This could result in a explosion if the user is not aware of it. Rotisserie motor and spit is included with the grill - Nice !
customer_reviews.author: Dan-D

customer_reviews.title: Missing a couple screws but still a great grill for price range
customer_reviews.text: This is a great grill! We were impressed especially given the lower price. Heats up well and cooks evenly. It was,however, missing 2 screws.
customer_reviews.author: J. A. John

customer_reviews.title: The igniter upgrade from old models is much better!
customer_reviews.text: It fits in the space of my old Napoleon Grill. The new lighting is much better than in the past. All in all a great grill for the price!
customer_reviews.author: B Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Not quality
customer_reviews.text: Two of the knobs broke on first use and another already has a crack.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

product_meta.title: Napoleon Grills Built-in Prestige 500 with Infrared Rear Burner Natural Gas Grill
product_meta.description: When building your own custom outdoor kitchen, there's nothing like adding a napoleon built-in Prestige 500 grill head. Stainless steel construction provides durability & style. Reversible cast iron cooking grids cradle your food, providing even heating & perfect sear marks every time. They're durable, just like grandmother's cast iron frying pan. The jetfire ignition system guarantees lighting every time, & multiple burners allow you to grill in any way imaginable. Versatile grilling isn't just relegated to direct or indirect cooking, use the integrated infrared rear burner for perfect rotisserie meals, or add the fun & flavour of charcoal with the optional charcoal tray for grilling & smoking. For the ultimate freedom to create, begin by adding a napoleon built-in grill head.
feature_bullets: This product is a Natural Gas unit and you must have Natural Gas plumbed out to your patio or deck to be able to use this grill; If you do not have Natural Gas plumbed, please look at our selection of Propane barbecues
